df-idl
blocks.content: Define the class of (two-sided) ideals of a ring ` R ` . A subset of ` R ` is an ideal if it contains ` 0 ` , is closed under addition, and is closed under multiplication on either side by any element of ` R ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-idl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cidl, cmpt(s0, crngo, crab(s1, cpw(crn(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cfv(cgi, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wa(wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1))), wral(s4, crn(cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(co(cv(s4), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), cv(s1)), wcel(co(cv(s2), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cv(s4)), cv(s1))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-idl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ Idl =(s0 ∈ RingOps ↦ { s1 ∈ P(ran((1st ` s0)))|((GId `(1st ` s0))∈ s1 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s1,(∀(s3 ∈ s1,(s2[(1st ` s0)]s3)∈ s1)∧ ∀(s4 ∈ ran((1st ` s0)),((s4[(2nd ` s0)]s2)∈ s1 ∧(s2[(2nd ` s0)]s4)∈ s1)))))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-pridl
blocks.content: Define the class of prime ideals of a ring ` R ` . A proper ideal ` I ` of ` R ` is prime if whenever ` A B C_ I ` for ideals ` A ` and ` B ` , either ` A C_ I ` or ` B C_ I ` . The more familiar definition using elements rather than ideals is equivalent provided ` R ` is commutative; see ~ ispridl2 and ~ ispridlc . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pridl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cpridl, cmpt(s0, crngo, crab(s1, cfv(cidl, cv(s0)), wa(wne(cv(s1), crn(cfv(c1st, cv(s0)))), wral(s2, cfv(cidl, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cfv(cidl, cv(s0)), wi(wral(s4, cv(s2), wral(s5, cv(s3), wcel(co(cv(s4), cfv(c2nd, cv(s0)), cv(s5)), cv(s1)))), wo(wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s3), cv(s1))))))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-pridl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ⊢ PrIdl =(s0 ∈ RingOps ↦ { s1 ∈(Idl ` s0)|(s1 ≠ ran((1st ` s0))∧ ∀(s2 ∈(Idl ` s0), ∀(s3 ∈(Idl ` s0),(∀(s4 ∈ s2, ∀(s5 ∈ s3,(s4[(2nd ` s0)]s5)∈ s1))→(s2 ⊆ s1 ∨ s3 ⊆ s1)))))})
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
}

blocks.name: df-maxidl
blocks.content: Define the class of maximal ideals of a ring ` R ` . A proper ideal is called maximal if it is maximal with respect to inclusion among proper ideals. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 5-Jan-2011.)

blocks.name: idlss
blocks.content: An ideal of ` R ` is a subset of ` R ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)

thm idlss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wss(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c3))
} = {
  simp1d(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(cgi, c3), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), c1)), wral(hs2, c2, wa(wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(hs2)), c1))))))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), w3a(wss(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(cgi, c3), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), c1)), wral(hs2, c2, wa(wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(hs2)), c1)))))))
  isidl(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cgi, c3), c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c2nd, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cgi, c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}

thm idlss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))→ c1 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 = ran(c3)
} = {
  simp1d((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)), c1 ⊆ c2, (GId ` c3)∈ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[c3]hs1)∈ c1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,((hs2[(2nd ` c0)]hs0)∈ c1 ∧(hs0[(2nd ` c0)]hs2)∈ c1)))))
  biimpa(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧(GId ` c3)∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[c3]hs1)∈ c1)∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,((hs2[(2nd ` c0)]hs0)∈ c1 ∧(hs0[(2nd ` c0)]hs2)∈ c1))))))
  isidl(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2, (GId ` c3), c3, (2nd ` c0))
  eqid((2nd ` c0))
  eqid((GId ` c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)

}

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1))

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cgi, c3))
} = {
  simp2d(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1), wss(c1, crn(c3)), wral(hs0, c1, wa(wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), c1)), wral(hs2, crn(c3), wa(wcel(co(cv(hs2), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(c2nd, c0), cv(hs2)), c1))))))

  isidl(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, crn(c3), c2, c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c2nd, c0))
  eqid(crn(c3))

  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

blocks.name: 1idl
blocks.content: Two ways of expressing the unit ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1idl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wb(wcel(c2, c1), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cgi, c5))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(c1, c3))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1), wceq(c1, c3))
  eqssd(c1, c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1), wss(c1, c3))
  idlss(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  ssrdv(hs0, c3, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1)))
  expr(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  eqeltrrd(cv(hs0), c1, co(c2, c5, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))
  ad2ant2rl(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(co(c2, c5, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  rngolidm(c0, cv(hs0), c3, c2, c5)
  idlrmulcl(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c3, c5, c4)
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wceq(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  rngo1cl(c0, c2, c3, c5)
  eqtri(c3, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), crn(c4))
  rneqi(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
  eleq2(c1, c3, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1)))
}

thm 1idl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))→(c2 ∈ c1 ↔ c1 = c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 = ran(c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(GId ` c5)
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)), c2 ∈ c1, c1 = c3)
  ex((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)), c2 ∈ c1, c1 = c3)
  eqssd(c1, c3, ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))∧ c2 ∈ c1))
  adantr((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)), c2 ∈ c1, c1 ⊆ c3)

  expr((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)), c2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c3, hs0 ∈ c1)
  eqeltrrd(hs0, c1, (c2[c5]hs0), ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))∧(c2 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)))
  ad2ant2rl(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), c2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c3, (c2[c5]hs0)= hs0)
  rngolidm(c0, hs0, c3, c2, c5)
  idlrmulcl(c0, c1, c2, hs0, c3, c5, c4)

  adantr(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), c2 ∈ c3)

blocks.name: 0rngo
blocks.content: In a ring, ` 0 = 1 ` iff the ring contains only ` 0 ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 6-Jan-2011.)

thm 0rngo(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crngo), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c3, csn(c1))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cgi, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cgi, c5))
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c3, csn(c1)))
  syl6ib(wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c3, csn(c1)), wceq(csn(c1), c3))
  syl5ib(wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(csn(c1), c3), wcel(c2, csn(c1)))
  mpbii(wceq(c1, c2), wcel(c2, csn(c1)), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  snid(c1)
  fvexi(c1, cgi, c4)
  eleq1(c1, c2, csn(c1))

thm 0rngo(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ RingOps →(c1 = c2 ↔ c3 = { c1 }))
  ⊣ c4 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 = ran(c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(GId ` c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(GId ` c5)
} = {
  impbid(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 = c2, c3 = { c1 })
  syl6ib(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 = c2, c3 = { c1 }, { c1 } = c3)
  syl5ib(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 = c2, { c1 } = c3, c2 ∈ { c1 })
  mpbii(c1 = c2, c2 ∈ { c1 }, c1 ∈ { c1 })
  snid(c1)
  fvexi(c1, cgi, c4)
  eleq1(c1, c2, { c1 })
  mpdan(c0 ∈ RingOps, (c2 ∈ { c1 } ↔ { c1 } = c3), { c1 } ∈(Idl ` c0))
  0idl(c0, c1, c4)
  1idl(c0, { c1 }, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  eqcom({ c1 }, c3)
  syl5com(c0 ∈ RingOps, c3 = { c1 }, c1 = c2, c2 ∈ c3)
  rngo1cl(c0, c2, c3, c5)
  eqtri(c3, ran((1st ` c0)), ran(c4))
  rneqi(c4, (1st ` c0))
  syl6bi(c3 = { c1 }, c2 ∈ c3, c1 = c2, c2 ∈ { c1 })
  eleq2(c3, { c1 }, c2)
  eqcomd(c1, c2, c2 ∈ { c1 })
  elsni(c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: divrngidl
blocks.content: The only ideals in a division ring are the zero ideal and the unit ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)

blocks.name: intidl
blocks.content: The intersection of a nonempty collection of ideals is an ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)

thm inidl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(Idl ` c0))→(c1 ⋂ c2)∈(Idl ` c0))
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c1 ⋂ c2), (Idl ` c0), ⋂ { c1, c2 }, (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(Idl ` c0)))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), c2 ∈(Idl ` c0), ⋂ { c1, c2 } =(c1 ⋂ c2))
  intprg(c1, (Idl ` c0), c2, (Idl ` c0))
  3impb(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), c2 ∈(Idl ` c0), ⋂ { c1, c2 } ∈(Idl ` c0))
  sylan2(c0 ∈ RingOps, (c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(Idl ` c0)), ⋂ { c1, c2 } ∈(Idl ` c0), ({ c1, c2 } ≠ ∅ ∧ { c1, c2 } ⊆(Idl ` c0)))
  jca((c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(Idl ` c0)), { c1, c2 } ≠ ∅, { c1, c2 } ⊆(Idl ` c0))
  adantr(c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), c2 ∈(Idl ` c0), { c1, c2 } ≠ ∅)
  prnzg(c1, (Idl ` c0), c2)
  prssi(c1, (Idl ` c0), c2)
  3expb(c0 ∈ RingOps, { c1, c2 } ≠ ∅, { c1, c2 } ⊆(Idl ` c0), ⋂ { c1, c2 } ∈(Idl ` c0))
  intidl(c0, { c1, c2 })
}

blocks.name: unichnidl
blocks.content: The union of a nonempty chain of ideals is an ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 5-Jan-2011.)

thm pridl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(PrIdl ` c0))∧(c2 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c3 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))))→(c2 ⊆ c1 ∨ c3 ⊆ c1))
  ⊣ c4 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  3imp2((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(PrIdl ` c0)), c2 ∈(Idl ` c0), c3 ∈(Idl ` c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1)), (c2 ⊆ c1 ∨ c3 ⊆ c1))
  expd((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(PrIdl ` c0)), c2 ∈(Idl ` c0), c3 ∈(Idl ` c0), (∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(c2 ⊆ c1 ∨ c3 ⊆ c1)))
  syl5com((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(PrIdl ` c0)), (c2 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c3 ∈(Idl ` c0)), (∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(c2 ⊆ c1 ∨ c3 ⊆ c1)), ∀(hs1 ∈(Idl ` c0), ∀(hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0),(∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1)))))
  simplbda(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(PrIdl ` c0), ∀(hs1 ∈(Idl ` c0), ∀(hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0),(∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1)))), (c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c1 ≠ ran((1st ` c0))))
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(PrIdl ` c0), ((c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c1 ≠ ran((1st ` c0)))∧ ∀(hs1 ∈(Idl ` c0), ∀(hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0),(∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1))))), (c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c1 ≠ ran((1st ` c0))∧ ∀(hs1 ∈(Idl ` c0), ∀(hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0),(∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1))))))
  ispridl(hs1, hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, ran((1st ` c0)), c4, (1st ` c0))
  eqid((1st ` c0))
  eqid(ran((1st ` c0)))
  df-3an(c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), c1 ≠ ran((1st ` c0)), ∀(hs1 ∈(Idl ` c0), ∀(hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0),(∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1)))))
  rspc2v(hs1, hs0, c2, (Idl ` c0), c3, (Idl ` c0), (∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1)), (∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(c2 ⊆ c1 ∨ c3 ⊆ c1)), (∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(c2 ⊆ c1 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  imbi12d(hs1 = c2, ∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1)), (hs1 ⊆ c1 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1)), (c2 ⊆ c1 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1))
  raleq(s0, hs1, c2, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))
  orbi1d(hs1 = c2, hs1 ⊆ c1, hs0 ⊆ c1, c2 ⊆ c1)
  sseq1(hs1, c2, c1)

  ralbidv(s0, c2, hs0 = c3, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1), ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))

  diff.hs0.w((∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c1))→(c2 ⊆ c1 ∨ c3 ⊆ c1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)

blocks.name: ispridl2
blocks.content: A condition that shows an ideal is prime. For commutative rings, this is often taken to be the definition. See ~ ispridlc for the equivalence in the commutative case. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)

  rabeqbidv(s0, cfv(cidl, cv(hs0)), cfv(cidl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wne(cv(s0), crn(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))), wral(s1, cfv(cidl, cv(hs0)), wi(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), crn(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))))), wa(wne(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(s0), crn(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))), wral(s1, cfv(cidl, cv(hs0)), wi(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), crn(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))))), wne(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))))

  raleqbidv(s1, cfv(cidl, cv(hs0)), cfv(cidl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), crn(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))), wi(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cidl)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), crn(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))

  syl6eqr(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(c1st, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1st)
  df-maxidl(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wa(wne(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wo(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c1))))))

thm maxidlval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ RingOps →(MaxIdl ` c0)= { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)|(s0 ≠ c1 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈(Idl ` c0),(s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = c1))))})
  ⊣ c2 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 = ran(c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, crngo, cmaxidl, { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)|(s0 ≠ c1 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈(Idl ` c0),(s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = c1))))}, { s0 ∈(Idl ` hs0)|(s0 ≠ ran((1st ` hs0))∧ ∀(s1 ∈(Idl ` hs0),(s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = ran((1st ` hs0))))))})
  rabeqbidv(s0, (Idl ` hs0), (Idl ` c0), hs0 = c0, (s0 ≠ ran((1st ` hs0))∧ ∀(s1 ∈(Idl ` hs0),(s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = ran((1st ` hs0)))))), (s0 ≠ c1 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈(Idl ` c0),(s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = c1)))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, s0 ≠ ran((1st ` hs0)), ∀(s1 ∈(Idl ` hs0),(s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = ran((1st ` hs0))))), s0 ≠ c1, ∀(s1 ∈(Idl ` c0),(s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = c1))))
  neeq2d(s0, ran((1st ` hs0)), c1, hs0 = c0)
  raleqbidv(s1, (Idl ` hs0), (Idl ` c0), hs0 = c0, (s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = ran((1st ` hs0)))), (s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = c1)))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cidl)
  imbi2d(hs0 = c0, s0 ⊆ s1, (s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = ran((1st ` hs0))), (s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = c1))
  orbi2d(hs0 = c0, s1 = s0, s1 = ran((1st ` hs0)), s1 = c1)
  eqeq2d(s1, ran((1st ` hs0)), c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(ran((1st ` hs0)), c1, ran(c2), hs0 = c0)
  rneqd((1st ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((1st ` hs0), c2, (1st ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, c1st)
  df-maxidl(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(s0, (Idl ` c0), (s0 ≠ c1 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈(Idl ` c0),(s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = c1)))))
  fvex(cidl, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crngo)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)|(s0 ≠ c1 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈(Idl ` c0),(s0 ⊆ s1 →(s1 = s0 ∨ s1 = c1))))})
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cidl, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cidl, c0)
  diff.cidl.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)

  syl6bb(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0)), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wne(c1, c2), wral(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))))))

  maxidlval(hs0, s0, c0, c2, c3)
  bitr4i(wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wa(wne(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))))), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wne(c1, c2), wral(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wa(wne(c1, c2), wral(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))))))

  neeq1(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  ralbidv(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2))), wi(wss(c1, cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wss(c1, cv(s0)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: maxidlidl
blocks.content: A maximal ideal is an ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 5-Jan-2011.)

blocks.name: maxidlnr
blocks.content: A maximal ideal is proper. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: maxidlmax
blocks.content: A maximal ideal is a maximal proper ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm maxidlmax(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cidl, c0)), wss(c1, c2))), wo(wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(c4))
} = {
  impr(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cidl, c0)), wss(c1, c2), wo(wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  ancoms(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cidl, c0)), wi(wss(c1, c2), wo(wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c3))))
  sylan2(wcel(c2, cfv(cidl, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))), wi(wss(c1, c2), wo(wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c3))), wral(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  simp3d(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))), wral(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wne(c1, c3))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0)), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wne(c1, c3), wral(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))))
  ismaxidl(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  rspcva(hs0, c2, cfv(cidl, c0), wi(wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), wi(wss(c1, c2), wo(wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c3))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wss(c1, cv(hs0)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wss(c1, c2), wo(wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cidl, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wss(c1, c2), wo(wceq(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c3))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm maxidlmax(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0))∧(c2 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c1 ⊆ c2))→(c2 = c1 ∨ c2 = c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 = ran(c4)
} = {
  impr((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0)), c2 ∈(Idl ` c0), c1 ⊆ c2, (c2 = c1 ∨ c2 = c3))
  ancoms((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0)), c2 ∈(Idl ` c0), (c1 ⊆ c2 →(c2 = c1 ∨ c2 = c3)))
  sylan2(c2 ∈(Idl ` c0), (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0)), (c1 ⊆ c2 →(c2 = c1 ∨ c2 = c3)), ∀(hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0),(c1 ⊆ hs0 →(hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c3))))
  simp3d((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0)), ∀(hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0),(c1 ⊆ hs0 →(hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c3))), c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), c1 ≠ c3)
  biimpa(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0), (c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c1 ≠ c3 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0),(c1 ⊆ hs0 →(hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c3)))))
  ismaxidl(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  rspcva(hs0, c2, (Idl ` c0), (c1 ⊆ hs0 →(hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c3)), (c1 ⊆ c2 →(c2 = c1 ∨ c2 = c3)))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c2, c1 ⊆ hs0, (hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c3), c1 ⊆ c2, (c2 = c1 ∨ c2 = c3))
  sseq2(hs0, c2, c1)
  orbi12d(hs0 = c2, hs0 = c1, hs0 = c3, c2 = c1, c2 = c3)
  eqeq1(hs0, c2, c1)
  eqeq1(hs0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((Idl ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ⊆ c2 →(c2 = c1 ∨ c2 = c3)))
}

blocks.name: maxidln1
blocks.content: One is not contained in any maximal ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 17-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm maxidln1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))), wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cgi, c3))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))), wn(wcel(c2, c1)), wne(c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))))
  maxidlnr(c0, c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0))
  syldan(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0)), wb(wn(wcel(c2, c1)), wne(c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)))
  maxidlidl(c0, c1)
  necon3bbid(c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1))
  1idl(c0, c1, c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm maxidln1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0))→ ¬ c2 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ c3 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(GId ` c3)
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0)), ¬ c2 ∈ c1, c1 ≠ ran((1st ` c0)))
  maxidlnr(c0, c1, ran((1st ` c0)), (1st ` c0))
  syldan(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0), (¬ c2 ∈ c1 ↔ c1 ≠ ran((1st ` c0))), c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))
  maxidlidl(c0, c1)
  necon3bbid(c1, ran((1st ` c0)), (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)), c2 ∈ c1)
  1idl(c0, c1, c2, ran((1st ` c0)), (1st ` c0), c3)
  eqid((1st ` c0))
  eqid(ran((1st ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: maxidln0
blocks.content: A ring with a maximal ideal is not the zero ring. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 17-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm maxidln0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))), wne(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cgi, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cgi, c5))
} = {
  necomd(c2, c3, wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))))
  neqned(c3, c2, wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0))), wn(wceq(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wn(wcel(c2, c1)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cmaxidl, c0)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)))
  maxidlidl(c0, c1)
  idl0cl(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  maxidln1(c0, c1, c2, c5)
  nelneq(c3, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm maxidln0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0))→ c2 ≠ c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(GId ` c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(GId ` c5)
} = {
  necomd(c2, c3, (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0)))
  neqned(c3, c2, (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0)))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0)), ¬ c3 = c2, c3 ∈ c1, ¬ c2 ∈ c1)
  syldan(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(MaxIdl ` c0), c3 ∈ c1, c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))
  maxidlidl(c0, c1)
  idl0cl(c0, c1, c3, c4)
  maxidln1(c0, c1, c2, c5)
  nelneq(c3, c1, c2)
}
